news.title: Why Non-Google PPC Matters for Law Firms
news.description: With Google dominating the search engine market, you may be wondering if any non-Google PPC advertising still matters. The short answer? Yes. Keep reading to learn more.

news.title: Behind the Scenes: Your Law Firm Website Maintenance
news.description: Search engine optimization helps lawyers strengthen their digital marketing strategy by focusing on visibility in Google Search results and other search engine results too!
